statements: UPDATE grant_writing_projects SET project_name='Project X', project_description='New project description' WHERE project_id=1;

UPDATE grant_writing_projects SET project_status = 'completed', project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE grant_writing_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_status = 'pending', team_member_id = 5 WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE grants SET title='Research Grant', agency='NSF', deadline='2023-08-30' WHERE grant_id=1;
